      • calculateMove

        public int calculateMove()
        Generates a random number within range of the board and plays a move at that column.
        Returns:
        Returns the row number of the move that was played

        public int getLastCol()
        A way to get the col that the computer player last played at to be able to update the game board for gui
        Returns:
